history.proof: intros. unfold filter. destruct H. destruct (p x). + reflexivity. + shelve.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
p: X -> bool
x: X
A: list X

Goal:
p x -> filter p (x :: A) = x :: filter p A

Premises:
filter : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
filter_id : forall p A, (forall x, x el A -> p x) -> filter p A = A
filter_mono : forall p A B, A <<= B -> filter p A <<= filter p B
filter_app : forall p A B, filter p (A ++ B) = filter p A ++ filter p B
ssrbool.onPhantom : forall (P : ?T -> Prop) (x : ?T), ssreflect.phantom Prop (P x) where ?T : [X : Type p : X -> bool x : X A : list X |- Type]
in_filter_iff : forall x p A, x el filter p A < -> x el A /\ p x
filter_incl : forall p A, filter p A <<= A
list_eq_dec : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec list X
ssrbool.inPhantom : forall p : Prop, ssreflect.phantom Prop p
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), x el filter f l < -> x el l /\ f x = true
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
ssreflect.Phantom : forall (T : Type) (p : T), ssreflect.phantom T p
ssrbool.SimplPred = fun (T : Type) (p : ssrbool.pred T) => ssrfun.SimplFun p : forall T : Type, ssrbool.pred T -> ssrbool.simpl_pred T Arguments ssrbool.SimplPred {T}%type_scope
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
List.filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'
Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
map_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : A) (l : list A), map f (x :: l) = f x :: map f l
ext_in_filter : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l -> forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
filter_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, filter f l = filter g l
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), x el l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
filter_ext_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> (forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a)
map_eq_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) (y : B) (ys : list B), map f xs = y :: ys -> exists (x : A) (xs' : list A), xs = x :: xs' /\ y = f x /\ ys = map f xs'
map_eq_cons' : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) (y : B) (ys : list B), y :: ys = map f xs -> exists (x : A) (xs' : list A), xs = x :: xs' /\ y = f x /\ ys = map f xs'
rev_eq_cons : forall (A : Type) (ls : list A) (x : A) (xs : list A), rev ls = x :: xs -> ls = rev xs ++ [x]
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
filter_map : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> map f l = map g l
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Variant phantom (T : Type) (p : T) : Prop := Phantom : ssreflect.phantom T p Arguments ssreflect.phantom _%type_scope Arguments ssreflect.Phantom _%type_scope
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA [] (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : Forall2 R [] [] | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') Arguments Forall2 [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Forall2_nil [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall2_cons [A B]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _ [l l']%list_scope
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup [] | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
incl_filter : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l <<= l
app_comm_cons : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), a :: x ++ y = (a :: x) ++ y
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P [] | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope

```  
intros. intro H.
unfold filter. destruct H.
- simpl. destruct (p x).
  + reflexivity.
  + contradiction.
- simpl. destruct (p x).
  + reflexivity.
  + apply filter_id. intros. apply H. right. apply H0.
```

original: intros. intro H. unfold filter. destruct H. - simpl. destruct (p x). + reflexivity. + contradiction. - simpl. destruct (p x). + reflexivity. + apply filter_id. intros. apply H. right. apply H0.
